Dialogue.Text: I hope you didn’t climb up here to report the kid, because I’ve got more important duties than hunting down some stolen sweets.
You new around here or something? That snot-nosed little kid runs around causing chaos to everyone around here.
If you want someone to do something about it, take it up with the other two guards. They’re always complaining about being bored…
Peh, you haven’t talked to the others yet, eh? One on the far side of the town ain’t so bad, but he’s only in it for the fighting. And they say I’m a grump.
The one by the well is just nauseating though. Never shuts up, always befriending the visitors. Really, I’m the only one who does my duties.

Sojourn ain’t guarding itself, and heaven knows the others don’t bother watching these walls. Listen, one day, that ol’ Lord of the Moon is coming back, and when he does, someone’s gotta be on the lookout!

What? You mean don’t know the legends? I thought everyone knew them! Well, something’s coming, and you best bet we gotta be ready when it does! How everyone else sits by and wastes time like this is beyond me!

Well, I dunno how to tell you this, but it’s my job. We’re the first line of defense, and if those screwballs don’t like it, then that’s that. And if whatever’s making those monsters disappear comes and kills us all, well then I suppose I can give them an earful that I tried to warn them! Now go away, I’m busy.
